title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Airbus A320 - EFIS Control Panel: data display
description:
In this how to we are going to look at the EFIS control panel of the Airbus A32NX addon. To be more specific we are going to look at the CSTR, WPT, VOR D, NDB and ARPT buttons and how you can use them before taking off, during the flight and when approaching an airport.
